text:
[Verse]
Stars are whispering low
In the midnight sky show
As the breezes blow
Feel the magic flow

[Verse 2]
Night's blanket on the land
We walk hand in hand
Footprints in the sand
Hearts in high demand

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight glow
Time it moves so slow
Love is all we know
Under the moonlight glow

[Verse 3]
Shadows dance on the floor
Always wanting more
Open up the door
To the great outdoor

[Bridge]
World's asleep and still
Till the morning chill
Wishing time would still
Moments we fulfill

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight glow
Time it moves so slow
Love is all we know
Under the moonlight glow
title: Under The Moonlight Glow
